contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 4, 1862 D Aston Contest
Aston Contest 0 Other
aston-contest
None
Aston Park, Birmingham See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4286.htm (includes a full list of the several own-choice pieces played by each band)
First day of a two-day festival. A two-stage contest - 3 qualifying pools, 2 bands qualifying from each.
Charles Godfrey snr was the chairman of the judges.
Prizes: 1st: £20, for band, and silver three-pint cup for bandmaster, value eighteen guineas 2nd: £15 for band, and a three-half-pint silver cup, value 12 guineas, for bandmaster 3rd: £10 for band 4th: £5 for band
July 20, 2011, 2:32 p.m. July 20, 2011, 3:33 p.m.
1 Dewsbury Band John Peel
2 Black Dyke Band Frank Galloway
3 Chesterfield Rifle Corps Band Unknown
4 Keighley Band William Lister Marriner
